channel.title: Adding NPC's
channel.description:
ok i added a npc in the autospawn then i saved then i compiled then i restarted the swerver then i restarted the client and npc not there this is the code i added -
spawn = 1138 2869 3592 2 2872 3595 2866 3589 1 mountaintroll
what am i doing wrong?? NVM! i worked out myself... i had height on 2 not 0

item.title: Adding NPC's
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Make sure it looks like this:

spawn = 1138	2869	3592	0	0	0	0	0	1	cait online now anounce

Make sure it’s placed correctly in autospawn, and there’s really no need to change the change of it, but if it’s really needed for you add the ranges in where the zero’s are.

Read full topic
